p: Spherically-shaped AECR-AuNPs, with an average diameter of 20 ± 5 nm, were obtained ( Fig. 1), as shown by the TEM. The SAED result analysis ( Fig. 2) showed that the diffraction ring corresponding to (111), (200), (220), (311), and (222) reflections of face centered cubic (fcc) crystal phases of gold.
